table.name: vtiger_rsnmediacontacts
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnmediacontacts` ( `rsnmediacontactsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `contactemail` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `nom` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `contactmediacomment` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, `contactphone` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `derniercontact` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT NULL, `rsntypescontactmedia` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsnmediadocuments` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsnregion` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsnthematiques` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `contactid` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `rubrique` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsncountry` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `interets` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, `rsnmediaid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnmediacontactsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnmediacontactscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnmediacontactscf` ( `rsnmediacontactsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnmediacontactsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
